item.title: Poor drainage and leaves in gutter on corner of Andover Road and St Stephen’s Road, 26th November
item.description:
Cars park dangerously, at the end of St Stephen’s Road where it meets Andover Road, when overflowing drains and leaves in the gutter obscure the double yellow lines. Please could the leaves/drain be cleared.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Saint Stephen's Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
